title: Vanderbilt's Lee Helping Athletes Make a Difference
itunes:title: Vanderbilt's Lee Helping Athletes Make a Difference
description:
Vanderbilt Athletic Director Candice Lee discusses the guidance she is providing student athletes on dealing with the death of George Floyd and the protests that have followed. She explains the difficulties in managing their feelings on the "tragic" situation and how they can be agents of change.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
